newsitem.title: HONG KONG: S&P assigns A rating to SIFCO's US$500 mln notes.
newsitem.headline: S&P assigns A rating to SIFCO's US$500 mln notes.

text.p: Standard & Poor's Corp said on Monday it had assigned an A rating to the Securitization & Infrastructure Funding Corp's (SIFCO) US$500 million medium-term note programme.
SIFCO is a limited liability company incorporated in the Cayman Islands.

S&P said the rating of the programme is based on the strength of the transaction structure and the financial guarantee insurance policy issued by Asian Securitization & Infrastructure Assurance (Pte) Ltd (ASIA Ltd).
ASIA Ltd's claims-paying ability rating is "A", the rating agency said.
